channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MN

item.title: Report X-2023070267
item.description:
Report X-2023070267

  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE AUDITOR NOTICED THAT THE OUTER PACKAGE WAS STAINED AND EMITTING A STRONG ODOR. THE RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED, RETRIEVED THE PACKAGE AND REMOVED IT TO THE PROCESSING AREA. RESPONDER FOUND THAT ONE OF THE CAPS OF THE INNER CONTAINERS WAS COMPLETELY DISLODGED. CANNOT BE RETURNED IN A SALVAGE DRUM, ALL FOUR CONTAINERS WERE PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: damaged hazmat was called out. QA responded and retrieved it, placing it in a lined tote and bringing it back to the damage area where they placed it in a lined tote and moved it to the drain mats in the incoming damaged hazmat/LQ area. in-house cleanup, awaiting disposition. DescribePack: one bottle leaked due to loose cap. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in lined tote, moved to drain mats

item.title: Report X-2023070085
item.description:
Report X-2023070085

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-28
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP, BY THE RESPONDER. IN THE DMP PACKAGE WAS OPENED BY RESPONDER AND FOUND TO CONTAIN ONE, 1 GALLON METAL PAINT CAN, FILLED WITH CHEMLOK 207 PRIMER FOR ADHESIVE, BEING SHIPPED AS A FLAMMABLE LIQUID HAX-MAT PACKAGE (UN1133, ADHESIVES, 3, II, 1 FIBERBOARD BOX X 1 GALLON). THE LID ON THE METAL CAN HAD COME LOOSE DURING SHIPMENT, ALLOWING THE PAINT TO ESCAPE AND STAIN THE OUTER CARTON PLUS INNER CAN, ALL MATERIAL WAS PROCESSSED THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023070036
item.description:
Report X-2023070036

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-24
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP BY THE RESPONDER. IN THE DMP PACKAGE WAS OPENED AND FOUND TO CONTAIN TWO, 1 GALLON, PLASTIC JUGS, OF ALPHA 90 IA FLUX, BEING SHIPPED AS A CORROSIVE HAZ-MAT PACKAGE, (UN3624, CORROSIVE,LIQUID, ACIDIC, INGORANIC, N.O.S.; (HYDROCHLORIC ACID, ZINC CLORIDE); 8, II, 1 FIBERBOARD BOX X 2 GAL). UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED ONE OF THE PLASTIC BOTTLES HAD A LOOSE CAP WHICH ALLOWED A SMALL AMOUNT OF THE ACID TO LEAK ONTO THE OUTER CARTON PLUS THE OTHER INNER BOTTLES. ALL PRODUCT WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2023061344
item.description:
Report X-2023061344

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-16
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP. IN THE DMP PACKAGE WAS OPENED AND FOUND TO CONTAIN FOUR, 1 GALLON, PLASTIC JUGS OF STATE FLOOR WIZARD, HIGH PERFORMANCE FLOOR STRIPPER, BEING SHIPPED AS A CORROSIVE HAZ-MAT SHIPMENT (UN3267, CORROSIVE LIQUIDS, BASIC, ORGANIC, N.O.S, (ETHANOLAMINE), 8, PG II, 1 FIBERBOARD BOX X 4 GAL). THE CAPS ON ONE OF THE FOUR JUGS HAD COME LOOSE, WHICH ALLOWED A SMALL AMOUNT OF THE CORROSIVE LIQUID TO LEAK OUT ONTO THE INNER PLASTIC JUGS, PLUS THE OUTER CARTON. ALL MATERIAL WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP ACCORDING TO REGULATIONS.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On June 22nd, FedEx Ground dropped of a package at an express station. The package was found to have an odor of fuel and a leak on one side of the package. There were no marks on the outside of the package indicating that it contained and dangerous goods. The station is hold the package for further disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023061331
item.description:
Report X-2023061331

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-14
  • City: MINNEAPOLIS
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: This package (772418606624) was found while unloading a PM Express shuttle from the FedEx Ground facility in Willmar, MN. The courier suspected this package was DG due to the markings on the box calling in herbicide and being in UN spec packaging. He brought it to manager Wayne Peterson's attention before the truck was offloaded. The manager inspected the package and looked up the SDS online to verify transportation information. In section 14 this chemical is listed as IATA regulated for air transport, as a UN 3082. As the package contained 2 inner containers, both containing 2.5 Gallons (9.45 L) this package would not qualify for shipment under special provision 197. It should be noted according to the SDS this package would not be regulated if it were to solely travel via truck. Package was instructed to be bumped by the Express station and to contact the FedEx Ground Facility it came from and have them retrieve the package. A second identical package was (772418607561) discovered later that night and was give n the same disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023070891
item.description:
Report X-2023070891

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-09T18:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-20
  • City: OSSEO
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package sent on sorter from unload box was wet when it got to the door on load side and was leaking. Pulled from conveyor and called out to QA. DescribePack: can clips on lid were popped off due to lake of inner packaging and proper shipping procedures. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA used absorb pads to soak up spill .Maint .scraped off conveyor and equipment
